definition: to open a furnace/to start up a furnace

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

sentences.english: The production management and technical measures for blowing-in and reaching design capacity of No. 6 BF in Liugang have been introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍柳钢6号高炉开炉到达产的生产管理，技术措施。

sentences.english: The paper concludes the operation experiences of No. 1 blast furnace in WISCO since its startup after revamping.
sentences.chinese: 对武钢1号高炉大修开炉以来的操作经验进行了总结。

sentences.english: General method and other new technologies of ore smelting electric arc furnace starting-up are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了矿热炉开炉的一般方法和两种开炉新工艺。

sentences.english: General method and other new technologies of ore smelting electric arc furnace starting-up are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了矿热炉开炉的一般方法和两种开炉新工艺。

definition: variant of 鏈|链[lian4], chain/variant of 煉|炼[lian4]
ancient cooking cauldron with two looped handles and three or four legs/pot (dialect)/to enter upon a period of (classical)/Kangxi radical 206/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes
Lingshi county in Jinzhong 晉中|晋中[Jin4 zhong1], Shanxi
